Pavilion v1.1.0 ships with a GulpJS build system for compiling, autoprefixing and compressing Pavilion’s SCSS files. The following tasks with subtasks are defined:

Command:   gulp (default task)

  • Clean the dist/ and demo/css/ folders
  • Compile SCSS to CSS
  • Strip CSS comments
  • Autoprefix (last two browser versions)
  • Optimize and compress CSS
  • Output expanded and compressed CSS


Command:   gulp watch

  • Run gulp (default task)
  • Watch for changes in scss/**/*
  • On change run gulp


Command:   gulp clean

  • Clean the dist/ and demo/css/ folders
